item.title: [Delta]Server Messages
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

I’m not too sure if I could do this on my server, but I know private servers that have a notification box that appears for a few second and disapears and might have a message from a staffmember or just shouting out an achievement or somthing along those lines. Right now mine is running as a “::yell” command which is pretty bad and would like to update it where like notification box comes up to all the players.

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 8 && c.playerRights >= 2) { String text = command.substring(8); c.yell("@red@[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }
I know its so basic and thats why I want to update it. I’m sure theres a tutorial out there, but again I don’t know the proper name for what this is called. Its like a player notification that comes up from the chat box but its not in the chatbox, its right above it, and then goes away after a few seconds.

Read full topic
